Test Description: Testing ability to optimize moves or scoring for a given game state and trying to have a grounded rule application
Difficulty Notes: Easy optimization problem with intuitive solution
Question: Considering the situation that the red player has three turns one after the other.What is the maximum score the red player can achieve at the end of the game? Assume that the game ends after these 3 turns. return the answer in the following format: [total_points_turn = <the maximum points by the end of two turns>, total_points_final = <total points by the end of the game>]
